name: PGA Tour Golf
overview: The only game to make the PGA TOUR cut You're about to enter the world of big-time golf. A huge crowd surrounds the 18th hole of THE PLAYERS Championship. After 27,032 yards, 71 holes, and 4 rounds, a 23-foot birdie putt stands between you and your first tournament victory. In PGA TOUR Golf you get it all. The excitement, the fun, the challenge and the rewards of the real PGA TOUR. Instant reply tracks the flight of the ball. TV-style coverage with all the angles. Spectacular aerial fly-bys. Multiple camera shots and tournament highlights. Crouch down to read the green. Rotate your 3D putting grid, study the breaks, aim, and sink it from the fringe. Play in real tournaments at the TPC's at Sawgrass and Avenel, and the PGA West Stadium Course. All designed from their original blueprints. Also includes the fantasy course, Sterling Shores. - Battery Backup saves tournaments, players, and stats. - Track real stats like total earnings, longest drive, par breakers, and more. - Special shots: chips, punches, and fringe putts. - Digitized sounds: cheers, groans, birds, splashing water, and more. - Over 10 ball lies including divots, heavy rough, and menacing sand.
